extracted-table.table-caption: The intra- and inter-scanner reliability of peak voxels within the left and right SMN of EO/EC conditions.

caption.p: The intra- and inter-scanner reliability of peak voxels within the left and right SMN of EO/EC conditions.

table-wrap-foot.p: The ICCs of the X, Y, and Z axes were calculated separately, and negative values for the average were calculated as 0. ICC, intraclass correlation; EO, eyes open; EC, eyes closed; V, visit.

extracted-table.table-caption: The Euclidean distance (mm) between the peak locations of V1 and V2 within the left/right SMN of EO/EC conditions (20 components).

caption.p: The Euclidean distance (mm) between the peak locations of V1 and V2 within the left/right SMN of EO/EC conditions (20 components).

table-wrap-foot.p: Sub10 was excluded because the SMN component could not be identified.
